title: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai - Brocon Imouto (Doujinshi)
description:
Kirino being cute around an amnesiac Kyousuke.

The title approximately translates into "A book about a sister with a brother complex intently wanting to flirt with her brother"

related.title: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
